price: Thus the decree of your Lord has come true against the wicked, that they will never believe[33].
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [33] That is the predestined decree that the ardently rebellious will never be guided.
